types:type.name: Accounts_array
types:type.types:shape:
#%RAML 1.0 DataType displayName: Accounts description: Array of Account Datatype
type: items: properties: id?: type: string example: '1234' firstName: type: string example: 'Harry' lastName: type: string example: Hearmonster address: type: string example: 12 Moon Street postal: type: string example: '60611' country: type: string example: UK miles: type: integer example: 999 creationDate?: type: datetime example: 2018-11-26T16:17:18Z format: rfc3339 type: displayName: Account Type description: Type of account, such as Personal or Business type: string enum: [personal, business]
